tool_description: Query public data for investment products including stocks, fractional shares, options, ETFs, and ADRs as on webull.com
title: Webull

api_list.name: news/list-by-portfolio
api_list.description: List news by multiple ticker id

required_parameters.name: tickerIds
required_parameters.description: The value of tickerId field returned in other endpoints, such as .../stock/search or .../market/get-common-ranking or .../market/get-top-active or .../market/get-top-gainers or etc...Separated by comma for multiple tickers

optional_parameters.name: currentNewsId
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, the last news id returned right in this endpoint, pass 0 for the first query

api_list.name: market/get-earnings
api_list.description: Get market earnings in specific region

required_parameters.name: regionId
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../regions/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: The format date is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2021-08-10

api_list.name: regions/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webull.p.rapidapi.com/regions/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webull.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: market/get-realtime-quotes
api_list.description: Get multiple stock quotes in real time.

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: The value of tickerId field returned in other endpoints, such as .../stock/search or .../market/get-common-ranking or .../market/get-top-active or .../market/get-top-gainers or etc... Separated by comma for multiple tickers

api_list.name: industries/get-performing-detail

required_parameters.name: regionId
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../regions/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: groupId
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../industries/list-best-performing endpoint

api_list.name: market/get-charts

required_parameters.name: tickerIds
required_parameters.description: The value of tickerId field returned in other endpoints, such as .../stock/search or .../market/get-common-ranking or .../market/get-top-active or .../market/get-top-gainers or etc... Separated by comma for multiple tickers

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per ticker, for paging purpose. Maximum is 800

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The interval of time, one of the following : m1(1 min)|m5(5 mins)|m15(15 mins)|m30(30 mins)|m60(1 hour)|m120(2 hours)|m240(4 hours)|d1(1 day)|w1(1 weekmth1(1 month)|mth3(3 months)|y1(1 year)

optional_parameters.name: timestamp
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, load data before this timestamp (in seconds). Ex : 1629122700
